channel.title: PvPscapezv7 eco/pk And Matrix-Reloaded 718 Spawn eco/pk 100% Uptime Vps hosted
channel.description:
[size=24pt]First would like to give the site for you to join :) http://www.pvpscapezv7.webs.com Or click the pictures[/size] [URL=http://www.pvpscapezv7.webs.com][IMG]http://i.minus.com/j9c7F1LxAmVPS.png[/img][/URL]
Added In Working MoneyPouch! Fixed the dupe in the MoneyPouch Disabled Dropping [Can be Undisabled if you like, code will be bellow] Added In Summoning Orb With Draining Fixed the Dupe with CheatEgine Fixed the Drop Save Dupe [90%] Added in custom items Added in [Server] Announcement when you get 99 [100% Working] Added in custom GFX and Anime for some basic commands Added in Lottery, [Lottie] Added in Zombie Minigame [I DO NOT TAKE CREDIT FOR THIS!] Disabled Shops for Users That Can Spawn Staff or players who can spawn can not attend in the lottery Added 2 Starters Per Ip Added Custom Log-ins when Staff Log in Fixed Total Level Donators need Donor points to use their Shops not cash[Makes it so reg players cant be teled there and buy the items] Added 120 Dungeoneering Fixed The Arrow Dupe Glitch Added Player Titles Added Auto-Server Save Added UIDs Added in dice command for Donator+ AND SO MUCH MORE! SOF [Squeal Of Fortune] Player Clipping Npc Clipping All Dupes either disabled or patched
Matrix is basic stuff u know about matrix :b I made it so nomad drops torva sea troll queen drops pernix and ice stykeworms drop virtus pics: [URL=http://www.pvpscapezv7.webs.com][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jL0IEWhOFlmYH.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://www.pvpscapezv7.webs.com][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jzK86TSEhZlBp.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://www.pvpscapezv7.webs.com][IMG]http://i.minus.com/j9KDKsUwAKaki.png[/img][/URL]
Matrix pictures now [URL=http://www.pvpscapezv7.webs.com][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jQCktMTCDg9AD.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://www.pvpscapezv7.webs.com][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbmaQSuLWZLpPA.jpg[/img][/URL]
